Heading 1: Maneuver to CM/SM SEP P, R ATT

Text: Maneuver to PAD ATT (Pitch to HORIZ CHK ATT)
F 06 60 (G MAX, V PRED, GAMMA EI)
Record values, compare with PAD for PGNCS go/no-go
F 50 25 (00041, BL, BL) REQUEST CM/SM SEP
Actual pitch ATT and PAD HOR CHK P is within 5 degrees
Heading 2: At DET 43m, or PAD GET HOR CHK
